backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining products, services, clients, appointments, transactions, user profiles, and admin authentication with AccessControl and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregated feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test IDs for recent admin‑login and navigation changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of various frontend files across pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme config defining color variables, dark‑mode tokens, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point setting fonts, metadata, dark mode class, and loading the React main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing page navigation state and rendering pages inside the AppLayout with toast support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Guard component that checks frontend and backend admin authentication and redirects users to admin login when required.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPassw: Dialog for entering admin credentials, validating them via useAdminPasswordGate, and triggering success callbacks on valid login.
frontend/src/components/agenda/Appointme: Dialog form to create an appointment, selecting client, service, date, time, and notes, and submitting via agenda mutations.
Displays a single appointment with status, time, client, service, and notes using UI cards and badges.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandHeade: Header showing brand logo, wordmark, and a small tagline.
frontend/src/components/clientes/ClientD: Client details panel showing profile info, preferences, allergies, and appointment history.
frontend/src/components/clientes/ClientF: Dialog form to add a new client with name, contact, preferences, and allergies.
frontend/src/components/estoque/ProductC: Card displaying product info, stock levels, low‑stock warning, and a quick‑adjust button.
frontend/src/components/estoque/ProductF: Dialog form to add a new product with fields for metadata, quantities, thresholds, and supplier notes.
frontend/src/components/estoque/StockAdj: Modal form allowing increasing or decreasing product stock with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/expenses/IncomeV: Renders a responsive bar chart comparing monthly income and expenses using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/expenses/Transac: Form to create income or expense transactions with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeCategor: Grid of category buttons that navigate to different pages with icons and fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeHeroCar: Image carousel with auto-updating indicators using a UI carousel component.
frontend/src/components/home/WhatsAppFlo: Floating button linking to WhatsApp with a preset message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App shell with header, content area, WhatsApp button, bottom navigation, and desktop footer.
frontend/src/components/servicos/Service: Displays service info with duration and price formatting plus a button to schedule it.
Dialog form component for creating a new service with validation, preset support, and submission via useServicosMutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Hook that checks whether the current caller is admin by querying actor.isCallerAdmin with react-query.
Client-side admin password gate storing auth state in sessionStorage and verifying credentials through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgenda.ts: Hooks for fetching appointments by status/date and creating new appointments via actor mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientes.ts: Hooks for listing clients (currently empty due to missing backend method) and adding new clients through actor mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useEstoque.ts: Hooks for fetching product inventory and adding/updating products via actor mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, storage, and status using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal hook to check backend health using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useServicos.ts: Hooks for listing services, toggling service status, and adding new services via actor mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating transactions and monthly aggregates using the actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with typography and texture overlays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLandingPage.tsx: Renders the admin landing dashboard with navigation cards for inventory and expense management.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Implements admin login form with credential validation and permission checking before navigation.
frontend/src/pages/AgendaDeHojePage.tsx: Displays daily appointment management with date navigation and creation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogoDeServicosPag: Shows a filterable and searchable service catalog with creation and scheduling dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ControleDeEstoquePage: Admin-only inventory management page with product search, low‑stock alerts, and dialogs for creating and adjusting products.
frontend/src/pages/ExpensesDashboardPage: Admin expenses dashboard showing monthly income vs expenses and a form for adding new transactions.
frontend/src/pages/FidelidadeClientesPag: Client management page with search, client creation, detail panel, and a prominent 'PAINEL DO DONO' admin access button.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public home page with hero carousel, categories grid, and a WhatsApp CTA for booking services.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and theme settings for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, UI guidelines, known issues, and architectural notes.
